statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY diagnosis ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, gender FROM patient_records ORDER BY gender DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_patients FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Flu';
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, date_of_visit FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE date_of_visit > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_visit DESC, doctor_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_id, doctor_name, prescription FROM medical_records JOIN patients ON medical_records.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY prescription DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT * FROM medical_records JOIN patients ON medical_records.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY patient_name, date_of_visit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birthdate, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM medical_providers WHERE location='Hospital';
SELECT patient_name, birthdate FROM patients ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, birthdate, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, provider_name, specialty, location FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN medical_providers ON medical_history.provider_id = medical_providers.provider_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medical_Record WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM Appointment WHERE status='Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM Patient ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM Medical_Record WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.treatment, m.record_date, a.appointment_date FROM Patient p JOIN Medical_Record m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN Appointment a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.status='Confirmed';

SELECT DISTINCT phys.first_name, phys.last_name, phys.specialty, app.appointment_date, pat.first_name AS patient_first_name, pat.last_name AS patient_last_name FROM Physician phys JOIN Appointment app ON phys.physician_id = app.physician_id JOIN Patient pat ON app.patient_id = pat.patient_id ORDER BY app.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, duration_minutes FROM appointments WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT mr.patient_id, mr.record_date, mr.diagnosis, m.test_type FROM medical_records mr INNER JOIN medical_tests m ON mr.record_id = m.record_id WHERE mr.diagnosis IS NOT NULL;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, a.appointment_date, d.first_name AS doctor_first_name, d.last_name AS doctor_last_name FROM appointments a INNER JOIN patients p ON a.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors d ON a.doctor_id = d.doctor_id ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, mr.record_date, m.test_type, m.result FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_records mr ON p.patient_id = mr.patient_id INNER JOIN medical_tests m ON mr.record_id = m.record_id WHERE p.first_name ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY p.first_name ASC, mr.record_date DESC;
